nodes.text: Jaun was a major in the New Republic's military during the Galactic Civil War, serving in General Hera Syndulla's battle group. After the battle group defeated the Galactic Empire's blockades in the Nythlide Array in 5 ABY, Syndulla planned to appoint a pair of carriers under Juan to remain to support the local militia while she continued her hunt for the Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing. The general echoed her intentions to Admiral Gial Ackbar when he asked her of the Nythlide Array's status during a meeting of the New Republic High Command. Jaun's carriers were set to later rejoin Syndulla's forces, but after she discovered that the 204th had carried out a string of genocides, the general decided to reroute the carriers to look for survivors.
Jaun was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
